mapper.insert: INSERT INTO diary (member_no_login, diary_name, diary_content, diary_image, created_at) VALUES (#{memberNoLogin}, #{diaryName}, #{diaryContent}, #{imageFileName}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT diary_id AS id, member_no_login, diary_name, diary_content, diary_image AS imageFileName, created_at FROM diary WHERE diary_id = #{id}

SELECT diary_id AS id, member_no_login, diary_name, diary_content, diary_image AS imageFileName, created_at FROM diary WHERE member_no_login = #{memberNoLogin} ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}
